beer.beer_description: Traditional Best Bitter brewed with Pale and Crystal malts and Goldings aroma hops. The result is a St Peters Best Bitterfull-bodied ale with distinctive fruity caramel notes. Contains Barley (Gluten)

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 80 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 17!

beer.beer_description: Traditional Best Bitter brewed with Pale and Crystal malts and Goldings aroma hops. The result is a St Peters Best Bitterfull-bodied ale with distinctive fruity caramel notes. Contains Barley (Gluten)

items.badge_description: Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 10 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 3.

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 10 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.badge_description: Whether you’re feeling extra special or extra strong, stopping by the local pub for a delicious Extra Special / Strong Bitter or English Bitter is always a good decision! That's 190 different beers with the style of Extra Special / Strong Bitter or English Bitter. Try 5 more for Level 39!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 15 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 4!

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 230 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 47!
